mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NO, USER_NM, USER_TEL, USER_HP, USER_FAX, USER_BIRTH, USER_SEX, ENTRY_YMD, QUIT_YMD, POSI_CD, FN_GET_POSI_NM(POSI_CD) AS POSI_NM, DUTY_CD, FN_GET_DUTY_NM(DUTY_CD) AS DUTY_NM, DEPT_CD, FN_GET_DEPT_NM(DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM, USE_YN, DEL_YN, REF_TOKEN, REF_ISSUE_DT, LAST_LOGIN_DT, LAST_LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT FROM TB_USER WHERE UPPER(EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = LOGIN_FAIL_CNT + 1 WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
UPDATE TB_USER SET REF_TOKEN = #{refToken}, REF_ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE, LAST_LOGIN_DT = SYSDATE, LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp}, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = 0 WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ, EMAIL FROM TB_USER WHERE REF_TOKEN = #{refToken}
